name: 2089: Space Divided
storyline:
In the sci-fi RTS game "2089 - Space Divided" you will become the commander of one of three factions. Go into battle for your faction on alien worlds and fight for power and wealth, or maybe just for bare survival.
Be smarter than your opponents and secure your dominance on the battlefield.
Whether through guerrilla tactics or huge war machinery is your decision.

The Andarers are very technically proficient. Discipline and excellence are a must for every young cadet.
Sophisticated weapons and strong fortifications make their bases almost impregnable.

The Redaxh definitely do not look human. More like insects, ugly insects.
The technologies are massively different from the other factions.
The weapon systems are incredibly advanced and devastating, but the structures look fragile. Still, you'd better run from their arms.

Everything about the Zan seems cobbled together.
Weapon systems seem outdated, not made for open combat.
On the other hand, they are extremely adept at attacking from ambush and are difficult for the enemy to see.
summary: 2089 - Space Divided is a classic science fiction real-time strategy game in which you collect resources, build up your base, raise troops and destroy your opponents with tactical finesse.
